summary: I am once again getting emails from people saying that Whatever arrives on their Feedly RSS reader sporadically if at all and when questioned about it, Feedly says that I am blocking them.  Feedly is lying to you, or at the very least is wildly extrapolating.  Not only am I not blocking Feedly, I specifically […]
title: Reminder: Feedly is Lying to You, I Am Not Blocking Them

title: James Bamford on Section 702 Extension

summary: Since I wrote about Perplexity it has been reported on by Wired, Wired again, Fast Company, the Verge, and others.  And there's more coming so keep your eyes peeled.  I even ended up on Perplexity's Wikipedia page...
title: Perplexity AI, Robots.txt, and Other Questions
